name: The Night Keeper
description:
The Night Keeper Night falls in The Garden, only the Keeper remains.

All music, art, and code, original work created for this game, were made during the BlackThornProd  #3 Game Jam. January 2021!

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • SPACE to turn on and off your lantern

Night falls in The Garden, just like it does at the end of every day, just like it has done for as long as we can remember.

In the evening, when the Visitors have gone, only the groundskeeper remains. He has one more job before he can rest.

He must travel the Garden one last time, extinguishing every light that keeps the dark away.

He’s done it his whole life, for as long as he can remember.

But somehow, each night is different. As the darkness closes in, new paths are revealed, new… friends… appear, and even after all this time, the journey towards darkness is never easy.
